response.original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Crystal Empire
response.overview: Twilight and the rest of the Mane Six head to the Crystal Empire for the "Crystalling" of Cadence and Shining Armor's new baby while Twilight takes the opportunity to present Starlight with her first friendship lesson. There are trips to Manehattan, the Cuti Mark Crusaders, Dragons and a lifelong dream of Rainbow Dashs becomes a reality.
response.title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Crystal Empire
